GSD.description:
media: imx-jpeg: Prevent decoding NV12M jpegs into single-planar buffers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 8d075ede7d24f19dc817c5bd517a53f0524f9031. For more details please see the references link.
